MRP.MRPMeasurementConfig

stores basic metadata about a reading

class MRPMeasurementConfig.MRPMeasurementConfig(p_id: int = 0, p_magnettype: MagnetType = MagnetType.NOT_SPECIFIED, p_nphi: int | None = None, p_ntheta: int | None = None, p_phiradians: float | None = None, p_thetaradians: float | None = None, p_sensordistanceradius: float = 1.0, p_sensorid: int = 0)

Class holds all information about the measurement such as values per axis, half/fullsphere or sensordistance

exception MRPMeasurementConfig.MRPReadingEntryException(message='MRPReadingEntryException thrown')
with_traceback()

Exception.with_traceback(tb) – set self.__traceback__ to tb and return self.
